name: PR_EST_EXTERNAL_CXT
description: This table contains external context related information for estimates.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient estimate record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PROV_ID
columns.description: The external provider used in the estimate.

columns.name: POS_ID
columns.description: The external place of service used in the estimate.
